mn103:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā pisinārāyaṁ viharati baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe.
mn103:2.2_0: ‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’”ti?
mn103:2.3_0: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evaṁ hoti:
mn103:2.4_0: ‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’”ti.
mn103:2.5_0: “Na ca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi evaṁ hoti:
mn103:2.7_0: itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’ti;
mn103:2.8_0: atha kinti carahi vo, bhikkhave, mayi hotī”ti?
mn103:3.1_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, seyyathidaṁ—
mn103:3.2_0: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṁ.
mn103:4.1_0: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ siyaṁsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā.
mn103:5.2_0: ‘imesaṁ kho āyasmantānaṁ atthato ceva nānaṁ byañjanato ca nānan’ti, tattha yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:5.3_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
mn103:5.5_0: yathā atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
mn103:5.7_0: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:5.8_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
mn103:5.10_0: yathā atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
mn103:5.12_0: Iti duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretabbaṁ, suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretabbaṁ.
mn103:5.13_0: Duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretvā suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:6.2_0: ‘imesaṁ kho āyasmantānaṁ atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sametī’ti, tattha yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:6.3_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.5_0: yathā atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.7_0: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:6.8_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.10_0: yathā atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.12_0: Iti duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretabbaṁ, suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretabbaṁ.
mn103:6.13_0: Duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretvā suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:7.2_0: ‘imesaṁ kho āyasmantānaṁ atthato hi kho sameti, byañjanato nānan’ti, tattha yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:7.3_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi sameti, byañjanato nānaṁ.
mn103:7.5_0: yathā atthato hi kho sameti, byañjanato nānaṁ.
mn103:7.8_0: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:7.9_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi sameti, byañjanato nānaṁ.
mn103:7.11_0: yathā atthato hi kho sameti, byañjanato nānaṁ.
mn103:7.14_0: Iti suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretabbaṁ, duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretabbaṁ.
mn103:7.15_0: Suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretvā duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:8.2_0: ‘imesaṁ kho āyasmantānaṁ atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sametī’ti, tattha yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:8.3_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva sameti, byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.5_0: yathā atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.7_0: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:8.8_0: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.10_0: yathā atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.13_0: Suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:9.1_0: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti siyā vītikkamo,
mn103:10.1_0: tatra, bhikkhave, na codanāya taritabbaṁ. Puggalo upaparikkhitabbo:
mn103:10.2_0: ‘iti mayhañca avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghāto, paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanāhī adaḷhadiṭṭhī suppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:11.2_0: ‘mayhaṁ kho avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto, paro hi puggalo kodhano upanāhī adaḷhadiṭṭhī suppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṁ.
mn103:11.3_0: Appamattakaṁ kho panetaṁ yadidaṁ—parassa puggalassa upaghāto.
mn103:11.5_0: svāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:12.2_0: ‘mayhaṁ kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghāto.
mn103:12.2_1: Paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṁ.
mn103:12.5_0: svāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:13.2_0: ‘mayhañca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto.
mn103:13.2_1: Paro hi puggalo kodhano upanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṁ.
mn103:13.3_0: Appamattakaṁ kho panetaṁ yadidaṁ—mayhañca vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto.
mn103:13.5_0: svāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:14.2_0: ‘mayhañca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto.
mn103:14.2_1: Paro hi puggalo kodhano upanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, na cāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:15.1_0: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppajjeyya diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi.
mn103:15.2_0: Tattha ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:15.3_0: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṁ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyā’ti.
mn103:15.4_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:15.5_0: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṁ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyāti.
mn103:15.6_0: Etaṁ panāvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:15.7_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:15.8_0: ‘etaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya na nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:16.1_0: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha, so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:16.2_0: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṁ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyā’ti.
mn103:16.3_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:16.4_0: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi taṁ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyāti.
mn103:16.5_0: Etaṁ panāvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:16.6_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:16.7_0: ‘etaṁ kho, āvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya na nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:17.1_0: Tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ pare evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
mn103:17.2_0: ‘āyasmatā no ete bhikkhū akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpitā’ti?
mn103:17.3_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:17.4_0: ‘idhāhaṁ, āvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁ, tassa me bhagavā dhammaṁ desesi, tāhaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhāsiṁ.
mn103:17.5_0: Taṁ te bhikkhū dhammaṁ sutvā akusalā vuṭṭhahiṁsu, kusale patiṭṭhahiṁsū’ti.
mn103:17.6_0: Evaṁ byākaramāno kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ceva attānaṁ ukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti, dhammassa cānudhammaṁ byākaroti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchatī”ti.
mn103:17.8_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
